description: This&nbsp;tequila-based drink is perfect for those who want to spice things up this upcoming&nbsp;Cinco de Mayo. There are two popular ways to make this drink---the first one is the traditional orange juice recipe that's found in Mexico, and the other one uses tomato juice. Whichever recipe you choose, you can make it spicy.This Sangrita is best made with Jose Cuervo Tradicional Silver. This crisp, smooth tequila is perfect for sipping on its own or mixing into cocktails. And at just below $25 a bottle, it's a great way to enjoy the flavors of Mexico without breaking the bank.
